privacyPolicy.description: label of the privacy policy link

privacyPolicyAcceptanceUsingAWindow1.defaultMessage: This site uses cookies for analytics only. There are no ads. By continuing to browse this site, you agree to this use.

privacyPolicyAcceptanceUsingAWindow2.defaultMessage: You can learn more about the {privatePolicyLink} and access it in the user menu at any time.
